nodes.text: Myron Beech was a Human male ranger who lived on Corellia during the Galactic Civil War.

By the time of the Battle of Yavin, Myron Beech was organizing hiking trails in the Thaos Mountains. Circa 1 ABY, one of his hiking group that included the man named Ilyamo disappeared in the mountains. Beech was interrogated by a spacer working for Commander Talte of the Corellian Security Force. The spacer later discovered that the hikers were captured by the criminals known as the cave-dwellers.

Myron Beech appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Myron Beech was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 28", on April 26, 2006.
